DeviceStatusData
DeviceStatusData

Contains the data needed by the InertialNode::getBasicDeviceStatus method.

StatusSelector

Represents the two different types of statuses returned by DeviceStatus.

BASIC_STATUS_STRUCTURE

0x01 - used to receive a limited device status.

DIAGNOSTIC_STATUS_STRUCTURE

0x02 - used to receive a complete device status.

SystemState

Enum of available system states.

SYSTEM_INITIALIZATION = 0x0001 SYSTEM_STARTUP = 0x0002 SYSTEM_RUNNING = 0x0003

DeviceStatusData
DeviceStatusData()

Creates a DeviceStatusData object with default values.
